alert.note: Alert for Gates of the Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 2:27PM MDT until April 20 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches up to pass level. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow are expected Friday. The heavier bands of snow may reduce visibility down to a half mile or less and cause road surfaces to become slushy and or slippery.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
